title: The support page's login page does not appear.
body: Hi, i haven't got LP for 2 ranked wins and im trying to make a ticket to support but no matter what i try, the log in page will not appear.

replies.body: You'll need to be logged into your account at the ticketing center to view your ticket, but you can always email us too via support@riotgames.com.  I did take a look into this for you though, but I wasn't able to see anything out of the ordinary with either your Flex or Solo queues.  Offer some more details in your ticket like which champions you were playing and the date, which will help our support team in your ticket locate these matches.  See you there!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=24PsMTHi,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-10-25T16:28:06.510+0000)
>
> You'll need to be logged into your account at the ticketing center to view your ticket, but you can always email us too via support@riotgames.com.  I did take a look into this for you though, but I wasn't able to see anything out of the ordinary with either your Flex or Solo queues.  Offer some more details in your ticket like which champions you were playing and the date, which will help our support team in your ticket locate these matches.  See you there!

I can't log in the support page thats my issue here, i click login and this page appears http://prntscr.com/h20sdt  I can't get it to work.
Indeed, on the top right there is a login button you'll need to select to gain access.  Otherwise, email us directly as an alternative.
